bkg16_Music

Class AlbumManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bkg16_Music.AlbumManager

  • public class AlbumManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class AlbumManager is responsible for creating, updating, retrieving and deleting Album records.
    Author:
    bengundy

    • Method Detail

      • createAlbum

        public void createAlbum(java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String releaseDate,
                        java.lang.String coverImagePath,
                        java.lang.String recordingCompany,
                        int numberOfTracks,
                        java.lang.String pmrcRating,
                        int length,
                        java.util.Set<Song> albumSongs)
        Method createAlbum generates a new Album record in the ORM object grid.
        Parameters:
        title - is the title of the album.
        releaseDate - is the date on which the album was released.
        coverImagePath - is the location of the cover image for the album.
        recordingCompany - is the company that recorded and released the album.
        numberOfTracks - is the number of tracks on the album.
        pmrcRating - is the PMRC's rating for the album.
        length - is the length of the album in minutes.
        albumSongs - is the songs associated with the album.

      • updateAlbum

        public void updateAlbum(java.lang.String albumID,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String releaseDate,
                        java.lang.String coverImagePath,
                        java.lang.String recordingCompany,
                        int numberOfTracks,
                        java.lang.String pmrcRating,
                        int length,
                        java.util.Set<Song> albumSongs)
        Method updateAlbum updates an Album record in the ORM object grid.
        Parameters:
        albumID - is the identifying UUID of the target Album.
        title - is the title of the album.
        releaseDate - is the date on which the album was released.
        coverImagePath - is the location of the cover image for the album.
        recordingCompany - is the company that recorded and released the album.
        numberOfTracks - is the number of tracks on the album.
        pmrcRating - is the PMRC's rating for the album.
        length - is the length of the album in minutes.
        albumSongs - is the songs associated with the album.

      • getAlbumList

        public org.json.JSONArray getAlbumList(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                       java.lang.String searchType)
        Method getAlbumList returns a set of albums that fit the incoming search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - is the string target of the search.
        searchType - is the portion of the album title that must match the searchTerm.
        Returns:
        is a JSON array containing a list of albums that fit the incoming search criteria.

      • getAlbumListByArtistID

        public org.json.JSONArray getAlbumListByArtistID(java.lang.String artistID)
        Method getAlbumListByArtistID returns a set of albums that are linked to the incoming artistID.
        Parameters:
        artistID - is the ID of the artist to be used in the search.
        Returns:
        is a JSON array containing a list of albums that are linked to the artistID.

      • getAlbumListBySongID

        public org.json.JSONArray getAlbumListBySongID(java.lang.String songID)
        Method getAlbumListBySongID returns a set of albums that are linked to the incoming songID.
        Parameters:
        songID - is the ID of the song to be used in the search.
        Returns:
        is a JSON array containing a list of albums that are linked to the songID.
